# AnchorUpdate.Event

**Enumeration**

An event that indicates whether an anchor was added, updated, or removed.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum Event
```

## Inspecting anchor update events

- **AnchorUpdate.Event.added**: An event that occurs when ARKit starts tracking an anchor.
- **AnchorUpdate.Event.updated**: An event that occurs when an existing anchor updates data.
- **AnchorUpdate.Event.removed**: An event that occurs when ARKit stops tracking an anchor.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of AnchorUpdate.Event

## Inspecting anchor updates

- **anchor**: The anchor that this anchor update contains information about.
- **timestamp**: The time when this anchor update occurred.
- **event**: The event which caused the anchor to update.
- **description**: A textual representation of this anchor update.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
